name: Jira Quick Open
description: Open Jira tickets directly from selected text

actions.title: Open in Jira
actions.javascript: const text = (popclip.input.matchedText || popclip.input.text).trim(); const clean = text.replace(/^\[\[/, '').replace(/\]\]$/, ''); popclip.openUrl('https://jira.skbroadband.com/browse/' + clean);
